笴字的基本解释

笴
gě
箭杆。
弓材。
器物像棍子的细长部分。
量词，用于有杆的东西：“一骑马一笴枪。”
笋制品。

笴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǎn］
［《廣韻》古旱切，上旱，見。］
［《廣韻》古我切，上哿，見。］
(1)箭杆。
(2)箭。
(3)杆。
(4)见“筍笴”。

笴字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　笴； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页881第12
【廣韻】古我切【集韻】【韻會】賈我切【正韻】嘉我切，?音哿。箭幹也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古老切，音杲。【周禮·冬官考工記】妢胡之笴。【註】讀爲稾。古文假借字。　又【正韻】古旱切，音稈。義同。　又【玉篇】公但切【類篇】居案切。義同。　又地名。【李白詩】明月白笴陂。

笴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
笴字的起名意思

暂无。

笴
Basic explanation of words
笴
gě
shaft.
Bow material.
The utensil is like a slender part of a stick.
Quantifier, used for things that have rods: "One horse rides one gun."
Bamboo shoot products.
笴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gǎn］
["Guangyun" ancient drought cut, drought, see. ]
["Guangyun" ancient me cut, go on, see you. ]
(1) Arrow shaft.
(2) Arrow.
(3) Rod.
(4) See "Sunflowers".
笴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　笴; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 881-12
[Guang Yun] Ancient Woqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Jia Woqie [Zheng Yun] Jia Woqie,? Yinkui. The arrow is dry.　[Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zhengyun]? Ancient cut, sound Gao. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji】Mao Hu Zhijing. [Note] Read as 稾. Ancient Chinese phony borrowed words.　[Zheng Yun] Ancient dry cut, sound stalk. The same meaning.　[Jade articles] Gong Dan cut [Class articles] Ju case cut. The same meaning.　Also place name. 【Li Bai's Poems】Mingyue Bai Libei.
